guide.introduction: Crafting under pressure is irresistible. This year the Craftzine gals suggested an ornament swap-- 12 days before Christmas. With a lot on our plates we all agreed to make time for crafting eight handmade ornaments each, and the deadline made it even more intense. Cheers to speed crafting!
guide.introduction_rendered:
Crafting under pressure is irresistible. This year the Craftzine gals suggested an ornament swap-- 12 days before Christmas. With a lot on our plates we all agreed to make time for crafting eight handmade ornaments each, and the deadline made it even more intense. Cheers to speed crafting!

Relevant parts
  • Cardboard
  • Spray paint
  • LED Sewing Kit
  • Yarn, string, or other cord
Tools
  • Hot Glue gun & hot glue
  • Pencil or pen
  • Pliers
  • Utility knife

parts.notes: or two LEDs and a coincell battery with holder

lines.text: Spray paint some scrap cardboard — I chose silver.
lines.text_raw: Spray paint some scrap cardboard — I chose silver.

lines.text: Sketch out your robot designs, either in a notebook first or directly on the cardboard.
lines.text_raw: Sketch out your robot designs, either in a notebook first or directly on the cardboard.

lines.text: Cut out your robots' bodies.
lines.text_raw: Cut out your robots' bodies.

lines.text: Cut legs and arms from small strips of cardboard.
lines.text_raw: Cut legs and arms from small strips of cardboard.

lines.text: Glue on arms and legs.
lines.text_raw: Glue on arms and legs.

lines.text: Keep a bowl of ice water nearby when using a hot glue gun.
lines.text_raw: Keep a bowl of ice water nearby when using a hot glue gun.

lines.text: Pierce two holes for each LED with an awl.
lines.text_raw: Pierce two holes for each LED with an awl.

lines.text: Feed the LED legs through the holes, minding the polarity. The long (+) leads should both be facing the same way.
lines.text_raw: Feed the LED legs through the holes, minding the polarity. The long (+) leads should both be facing the same way.

lines.text: On the back, twist the two long leads (+) together, and twist the two short leads (-) together. This is called wiring the LEDs in parallel.
lines.text_raw: On the back, twist the two long leads (+) together, and twist the two short leads (-) together. This is called wiring the LEDs in parallel.

lines.text: Look for the (-) symbol near one side of the battery holder. Stack the holder on top of the LED leads matching + to + and - to -.
lines.text_raw: Look for the (-) symbol near one side of the battery holder. Stack the holder on top of the LED leads matching + to + and - to -.

lines.text: The circuit is the same as my LED shoe clips project as well as my firefly embroidery project.
lines.text_raw: The circuit is the same as my [guide|1178|LED shoe clips project] as well as my [guide|44|firefly embroidery project].

lines.text: Use pliers to twist the LED leads around the battery holder legs, and insert a battery to confirm the circuit illuminates the robot's eyes.
lines.text_raw: Use pliers to twist the LED leads around the battery holder legs, and insert a battery to confirm the circuit illuminates the robot's eyes.

lines.text: Use hot glue to secure the battery holder while it's still on.
lines.text_raw: Use hot glue to secure the battery holder while it's still on.

lines.text: Slide a strip of paper between the battery and the holder to provide a pull-to-start tab.
lines.text_raw: Slide a strip of paper between the battery and the holder to provide a pull-to-start tab.

lines.text: Insert the battery in the holder, pinching the paper strip between.
lines.text_raw: Insert the battery in the holder, pinching the paper strip between.

lines.text: Write "pull here" on the paper strip.
lines.text_raw: Write "pull here" on the paper strip.

lines.text: Draw buttons, dials, the current year, or any other decorations on your robot.
lines.text_raw: Draw buttons, dials, the current year, or any other decorations on your robot.

lines.text: Don't forget to sign the back!
lines.text_raw: Don't forget to sign the back!

lines.text: Glue on a loop of string for hanging.
lines.text_raw: Glue on a loop of string for hanging.

lines.text: Merry Xmas!
lines.text_raw: Merry Xmas!

guide.summary: Make a simple circuit robot Christmas ornament.
guide.title: LED Robot Ornament
